oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - 1951-02-01 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), and Audrey Williams (performer), on February 1, 1951 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Audrey Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the first tune -- My Sweet Love Ain't Around (Hank Williams) -- Hank Williams and Louis Buck talk -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Hanks Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- Model T Love (Audrey Williams) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- Where The Soul Of Man Never Dies (Audrey Williams and Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statement (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Closing theme -- [break] -- Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the first tune -- Mind Your Own Business (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams and Louis Buck talk -- Hank Williams introduces Audrey Williams and the next tune -- I Like That Kind (Audrey Williams) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces next tune -- When God Dips His Love In My Heart (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statements (Hanks Williams and Louis Buck) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Williams, Audrey, 1923-1975;
